span.a: Information from Orange County Public Schools

p.a: All COVID-19 (Coronavirus) information will be posted here. Check back frequently for updates.

br.span: Due to the continued COVID-19 spread, Governor Northam has ordered that all Virginia K-12 schools close for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year.

p.strong: Schools | Departments | School Board | Parents and Students | Employment | Staff Directory | For Staff | Translate Page

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_0 post-13261 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid19

div.p: Staff have successfully implemented three weeks of planning into reality this past week. Throughout the past three weeks under the leadership of the Directors of Instruction, teachers created digital content for students for the remainder of the school year. They...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_1 post-13257 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid19

div.p: We are very appreciative of the efforts of our school nutrition staff and other employees who participated in a successful meals program on Thursday, April 16. It was reported that 11,774 meals were served across the school system at our pick up sites: GBES, UES,...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_2 post-13249 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid19

h2.a: Información de la escuela superior del condado de Orange para el periodo 4 Cuarto

div.p: Preguntas de los alumnos que están en los grados (9 al 11 únicamente) Cớmo se proporcionará instrucción a los estudiantes durante el resto del ano escolar? Los docentes proporcionarán las tareas de curso a s sus alumnos a través de Google classroom. A los estudiantes...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_3 post-13238 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid19

h2.a: Update on the Deployment of the Instructional Plan to Complete the Year

div.p: In response to the closing of schools for the fourth quarter, OCPS has developed the following plan to Deliver essential content (skills and understanding) through end of school year, Engage students in learning in all courses including electives and the fine arts,...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_4 post-13226 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid19

div.p: Orange County High School principal, Mr. Green, and staff have developed a document that we hope you find useful as we continue to move through our school year. The contents of the document focus on more specific areas of interest rather than broad generalities. You...

li.a: Orange County High School Program of Studies 2020-2021
Vendor and Bidder Information for Orange County Public Schools E-Rate Services

div.h3: Custom App for Orange County Public Schools

img.alt: Orange County Public Schools Web App

p.img: Stay in touch with Orange County Public Schools by downloading our mobile app.

div.p:
– Android Version from Google Play
– Apple Version from the App Store

br.span: The Orange County School Board does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, political affiliation, sex, gender, age, marital status, genetic information or disability in its employment practices or educational program and activities. Compliance inquiries should be directed to the Director of Human Resources, 200 Dailey Drive, Orange, VA 22960 or by phone at 540-661-4550.
The Orange County Public Schools web site collects no personal information, does not place a "cookie" on your computer, and will not track your movements through the web site.
